name: improved-toolkit
description: **Komyut** provides a CLI-based toolkit for developers to design jeepney routes, generate Route Packs, and compile route caches — essential for powering Komyut’s backend routing engine.

scripts.bundle:routebuilder: npm run build-ts && npm run prepare-assets:routebuilder && pkg dist/routebuilder/index.js --config pkg-routebuilder.json --output ./bin/routebuilder.exe
scripts.bundle:routecalc-gui: npm run build-ts && npm run prepare-assets:routecalc-gui && pkg dist/routecalc-gui/index.js --config pkg-routecalc-gui.json --output ./bin/routecalc-gui.exe
scripts.bundle:all: npm run bundle:routebuilder && npm run bundle:routecalc-gui
